about_the_game:
Brazilian indie game.

⦁ History
On November 17, 2019, the first case of the "Z" virus was detected in the world, some say that bats were the transmitters, others say that it was created in a laboratory, but the truth is that no one knows exactly how the virus emerged, the only thing that everyone knows is that the virus started an apocalypse that would almost lead to the extinction of the human race. The infected lose control of their body, the virus affects the central nervous system (CNS) making the host hostile to any living being around it. The host stops breathing and the heart stops beating, with only a small part of the brain functioning.
2 years after the first case of the "Z" virus the world was already completely destroyed, governments fell and the death toll exceeded 7 billion people worldwide.
November 17, 2022.
3 years after the first case of the "Z" virus, the infected would still be roaming the world, whether by land or sea. And here, on Tristan da Cunha, a remote island with around 250 inhabitants, is where our game takes place. Soon after the first infected arrived on the island, several inhabitants were killed and the ones left need to do everything to survive, unite with other survivors. Creating a fort, finding supplies and protecting your base is the best option.

What can you do in BattleZ?
Build a base to protect yourself from Zombies.
Invade other players base.
Train a dog to help you survive.
Create or join a Guild to facilitate your survival.
Explore cities and islands to get supplies.
Plant and raise animals.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win11 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
